content: Betcoin x Bombay LIVE Blackjack Leaderboard - Starts Monday, 17 Apr - $1500 in guaranteed prizesWin big prizes, just for playing at the best bitcoin LIVE casinoYour home for the best casino leaderboard promotions is back with another hot contest, featuring our latest LIVE Blackjack offering! The top 20 players in each will share $1500 in bitcoin prizes and free bets!1st- $2002nd- $1253rd- $754-5th- $506-7th- $50 free bet8-10th- $25 free bet11-15th- $10 free bet16-20th- $5 free betComplete details here:

comments.body: Betcoin x Bombay LIVE Blackjack Promo - Casino Bonuses IssuedAll leaderboard winners have now been paid for the LIVE blackjack promotion.
